topic.fullpath: Topic :: Text Editors :: Integrated Development Environments (IDE)

name: qbTeX - A platform independent LaTeX IDE
short_description: qbTeX (say cube-TeX) is a platform independent LaTeX IDE that allows its users to manage large LaTeX projects on both win32 and UNIX platforms offering means for management of large LaTeX projects, an integrated texteditor with shortcuts to common LaTeX c
